page.title: 06LOCAL HISTORY IN URCHFONT
page.content: she kept her cows that means she sold milk.The post offices were all over the place.The first one was where Mr. Jorden lives now to the left of the no cycling path on the High street.The next one is where the spar is today then it went to the old forge next to the garage.Then it went to where it is today.The butcher shop used to be a saddlers owned by a Mr.Fuller.When you went into the shop there was a lovely smell of leather.In the last 20 years alot of estates have been built, for instance: Manor Close,Bowdens,The Orchard, Peppercombe Close,The Paddock ,Walnut Close,and many others.The roads haven't changed much appart from the roads into the estates , but they did make a big change from three ways on the Lavington road down to the butchers where they widened it for traffic and cut the bank away.
